title: AI-Powered Travel Guide
description: Smart travel planner that generates personalized itineraries, cultural recommendations, and location insights using AI.

title: ProFile-AI
description: Resume analyzer and AI-based cover letter generator that ensures ATS-friendly formatting using OpenAI and Supabase.

title: Ape Authorization

title: Kanban Board
description: Trello-style Kanban board for task management with drag-and-drop, persistence, and responsive UI for portfolio showcase.
